author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: What a beautiful vessel (apart from the funnel).

author: Phil
content:
Google “The Beasts of Holm” and you’ll find at leat two videos of the site.
One about diving it and the other about diving the sinking site.

author: Rick Spilman
content: If they hadn’t slammed into the rocks at speed, no one would have died. The crowding only made the death toll worse.

author: Willy
content:
How sad. They survived the war only to die a mile from home.

It is only my opinion that the reason for so many to have died was because of it being 2am in the morning. Not so much the over crowding.
